dr_dedicated_host_id.description: Specifies the new DeH ID for the DR site.

dr_flavor_ref.description: Specifies the flavor ID of the DR site server after the modification.

flavor_ref.description: Specifies the flavor ID of the production and DR site servers after the modification.

production_dedicated_host_id.description: Specifies the new DeH ID for the production site.

production_flavor_ref.description: Specifies the flavor ID of the production site server after the modification.

protected_instance_id.description: Specifies the ID of the protected instance to resize.

region.description: Specifies the region in which to create the resource. If omitted, the provider-level region will be used.
